"Switching Weapons": "This will instruct you on how to change your weapon."
"You can register multiple weapons, which can be switched between in battle on the Weapon Palette. Select one of the weapons from the Weapon Palette to equip it."

"You can cycle through weapons on the Weapon Palette using the following buttons.
Move Up:<%PaletteReverse>
Move Down: <%PaletteForce>

Finally, press <%Access> to confirm and equip your weapon."
"Let's try it out now, shall we?"
